title: Snake Charmer's Flute
summaries: The Snake Charmer's Flute is a tool item that summons a climbable snake. It can be found in Sandstone Chests in the Underground Desert biome, or from Oasis Crates and Mirage Crates.

When used, it places a pot that a snake rises from. Once the snake reaches its full height of 100 tiles or touches a block, it stops rising and becomes climbable like a <linked>Rope</linked>. It is also possible to place blocks against it when it is fully extended. The snake and the pot disappear after approximately 25 seconds. It also produces a small amount of light.

statistics.Sell: 1 GC
